displayProperties.subtitle: Fragmented Researcher
displayProperties.description: Left scarred by his encounter with the Vex, the irascible Asher Mir holds Io for the Vanguard... and science.
displayProperties.name: Asher Mir

BungieNet.Engine.Contract.Destiny.World..subtitle: Fragmented Researcher
BungieNet.Engine.Contract.Destiny.World..description: Left scarred by his encounter with the Vex, the irascible Asher Mir holds Io for the Vanguard... and science.
BungieNet.Engine.Contract.Destiny.World..name: Asher Mir

interactions.flavorLineOne:
Asher congratulates you on your victory over Ghaul.

While the head of the Red Legion has been slain, the Red War continues across the solar system.

headerDisplayProperties.description: Asher is inspired by your heroism in victory, and wishes to speak with you in the Rupture.
headerDisplayProperties.name: Asher Mir

interactions.flavorLineOne:
Asher thanks you for the work you've done in securing Io.

New challenges appear on the horizon, however.

headerDisplayProperties.description: Asher wishes to express his gratitude for your many exploits on Io. Meet with him in the Rupture.
headerDisplayProperties.name: Asher Mir

interactions.flavorLineOne: Asher thanks you for eliminating the annoyances from the Prison of Elders on Io.

headerDisplayProperties.description: Asher thanks you for eliminating the annoyances from the Prison of Elders on Io.
headerDisplayProperties.name: FLASHPOINT: IO

interactions.flavorLineOne: Asher's right arm seems to twitch involuntarily toward the gift, but you can't be sure. He seems as thankful as ever.
For the thoughtful gift, Asher offers as much gratitude as ever—which is to say very, very little.

Asher thanks you for the significant progress you've made on Io.

Continue your adventures on the planet to earn his respect and rewards.

headerDisplayProperties.description: Now that you've proven to be a valuable... assistant, Asher wishes to speak with you in the Rupture.
headerDisplayProperties.name: Asher Mir

interactions.flavorLineOne: You cleared the Pyramidion of the Taken and prevented them from rebuilding their army. Asher refuses to thank you for doing your job.
Asher is a scientist. He knows, better than most, that every action has an equal and opposite reaction. Whatever you choose to do, Asher just hopes you are ready to pay the price.

headerDisplayProperties.description: Asher is more acquainted with death than most Guardians. But even he must be having a hard time after Cayde's passing.
headerDisplayProperties.name: Asher Mir

interactions.flavorLineOne:
The Taken have entered the Pyramidion, most likely looking to replenish their ranks following the Taken War. 

Investigate the Taken activity in the Pyramidion on Io.

We don't know enough about the Red Legion's flagship, the Almighty. Asher Mir believes that by gaining access to the Golden Age Warmind Network, we could retrieve important data to improve the odds of victory. 

Choose your exotic gear and find out the Almighty's weakness by completing mission FURY.
Complete various activities around Io, including public events, Lost Sectors, and Heroic Adventures.

headerDisplayProperties.description: Complete various activities around Io, including public events, Lost Sectors, and Heroic Adventures.
headerDisplayProperties.name: FLASHPOINT: IO

interactions.flavorLineOne: Your reputation in the Crucible precedes you. Take this reward in recognition of your deeds.
Complete patrols and public events on Io to get Phaseglass Needles and earn rewards from Asher Mir.
Show Asher Mir proof of your deeds on Io.
Increase your level to claim these rewards.
Your reputation on Io precedes you. Take this reward in recognition of your deeds.
